title: My handwriting is too big. It looks very messy when I write quickly. My handwriting is good, and smaller, when I write more slowly. How can I keep it smaller? - Quora

response.answer_text: I second to @User-9928144614027115804’ answer and in addition I would suggest using a much thinner pen nib. This will trick your brain into keeoi g the ratio between the strokes and spaces between letters and hence you will probably write smaller. Think about it. When you use a thick marker, you write bigger and vice versa!
Practice is http://required.so practice writing slow and small
